stories.headline: Finding files for mapping
stories.summary: Explores how to find geographic information system (GIS) data on the web, highlighting government initiatives like www.geodata.gov to centralize data access.

stories.headline: Data shows woes for middle-class blacks
stories.summary: Examines U.S. Census Bureau data to reveal disparities in living conditions between black and white middle-class families, showing how black middle-class areas often lie near poverty-stricken neighborhoods.

stories.headline: White-collar convicts get lighter sentences
stories.summary: Investigates the disparity in sentencing between white-collar crimes and drug offenses in North Alabama, revealing significantly lighter penalties for financial crimes.
